item.title: Tools and Ecosystem of WebAssembly with Rust
Hello My New Blog
item.description: About me Hello, my name is Yusuke Kominami. I’m living in Japan, and working as a machine learning engineer. I’m 23 years old and graguated from Kyoto University in this March. When I was student, I majored in Bioinformatics. Why am I a software engineer? Actually, I’m not interested in Biology, more interested in computing. So when I was in university, I just stuck on programming. For more about me,
